price: 106. « Seigneur ! diront-ils, notre infortune a pris le dessus sur nous et nous étions des gens égarés.
arabic: قَالُواْ رَبَّنَا غَلَبَتۡ عَلَيۡنَا شِقۡوَتُنَا وَكُنَّا قَوۡمٗا ضَآلِّينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: qālū rabbanā ghalabat ʿalaynā shiq'watunā wakunnā qawman ḍāllīna
